Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.layout

Interface AbstractStringLayout.Serializer2

All Known Subinterfaces:
AbstractStringLayout.Serializer
Enclosing class:
AbstractStringLayout
public static interface AbstractStringLayout.Serializer2
Variation of AbstractStringLayout.Serializer that avoids allocating temporary objects. As of 2.13 this interface was merged into the Serializer interface.
Since:
2.6
